thread.title: Jemma Lucy being 'lined up' for Celebrity Big Brother's summer series
thread.title_full: Jemma Lucy being 'lined up' for Celebrity Big Brother's summer series

author: Vicki Newman
title: Jemma Lucy being 'lined up' for Celebrity Big Brother's summer series
text:
Jemma Lucy being 'lined up' for Celebrity Big Brother's summer series The Ex On The Beach star could enter the famous house Share Is Jemma Lucy going in the CBB house this summer? Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Reality star Jemma Lucy is said to be in talks with Celebrity Big Brother producers to appear in the next series. 
The tattooed beauty, who caused a storm when she appeared on Ex On The Beach, could be going into the famous house this summer. 
Bosses are reportedly hoping to sign the glamour model up for what they're hoping will be the most explosive series yet. 
A source told The Sun Online : "Everyone knows Jemma makes for great telly so it’s no surprise she’s on the Celebrity Big Brother wanted list. Read More Chantelle Connelly admits lesbian relationship with Jemma Lucy was FAKE and they did it to make money Is Jemma going into CBB? (Photo: Jemlucy/snapchat) 
"She’s not afraid to have a barney or strip off so she’ll definitely spice up the house." 
Channel 5 bosses are said to be pulling out all the stops for the series, which will be the 20th so far. 
Similarly to the January show, producers are planning to bring back stars from both the Channel 4 and Channel 5 versions to mark the anniversary. 
The show, which reportedly has the working title Summer Legends, will run after the regular Big Brother , which will have a twist this year by taking in pairs of housemates, such as twins or mothers and daughters. Jemma has already appeared on a string of reality show (Photo: Channel 5) 
Viewing figures for the last series had been dwindling until the introduction of feisty How Clean is Your House? star Kim Woodburn, whose furious rants and arguments with other housemates set tongues wagging across the UK. 
Meanwhile, Jemma's recent lesbian relationship with Geordie Shore's Chantelle Connelly was exposed as fake. 
Chantelle took to Twitter to admit they they'd pretended to be together to make money. 
They put on quite the display as they hit the town together on nights out, walking hand in hand and packing on the PDAs with plenty of kissing. She's known for saying exactly what she thinks (Photo: Naked Entertainment) 
But it was all a big deception. 
Chantelle told her 164,000 followers: "Just to let everyone know the whole me and @jem_lucy relationship was laugh since the papers started it we rode it and had the last laugh 
"Ppl need to stop hating the papers started it at the end of the day just cause we made [money] don't get mad peeps". [sic] 
Chantelle posted several money emojis along with her tweets to show that they'd cashed in from the lie. 
Jemma's representatives denied the star had been in contact with the show when contacted by Mirror Celeb. Like us on Facebook
